1.subtask_description: Retrieve the current weather information for Seattle, USA.

1.handles: Retrieves current weather information for Seattle.

input_vars.name: weather_query_messages
input_vars.description: Array of messages to query current weather in Seattle.
input_vars.value: [{"role": "user", "content": "What is the current weather in Seattle, USA, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and any weather alerts?"}]

output_vars.name: current_weather_info
output_vars.description: Current weather information for Seattle, USA.

2.handles: Performs deep research to gather comprehensive weather data with citations.

input_vars.name: weather_query_messages
input_vars.description: Array of messages to perform deep research on weather in Seattle.
input_vars.value: [{"role": "user", "content": "What is the current weather in Seattle, USA, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and any weather alerts?"}]

output_vars.name: comprehensive_weather_data
output_vars.description: Comprehensive weather data for Seattle, USA, with citations.

2.subtask_description: Search GitHub for repositories related to weather data analysis or visualization.

1.handles: Searches for GitHub repositories related to weather data analysis or visualization.

input_vars.name: github_search_query
input_vars.description: Search query for GitHub repositories related to weather data analysis or visualization.
input_vars.value: weather data analysis OR weather visualization

output_vars.name: weather_repositories_list
output_vars.description: List of GitHub repositories related to weather data analysis or visualization.
